<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This will enable COEs based on Entitlements</description>
        <name>Enable COE based on Entitlements - HR SP</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var activeChanged = false;
var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_coe');
gr.query();
while (gr.next()){
	if(gs.getProperty("sn_hr_core.hr_enforce_license","false") == "true" && !sn_lef.GlideEntitlement.entitlementExists(gr.entitlement_id.toString())){
		gr.active=false;
		gr.update();
        activeChanged = true;
	}
}
if(activeChanged)
    new sn_hr_core.hr_license().resetCOEConfig();
]]></script>
